name: iotGizmo
0:
”Alexa, turn on the light”
”Alexa, set the office to 72 degrees”
”Alexa, set the light to 50 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Amazon and iotGizmo join forces to make your life with Alexa and iotGizmo smart devices more comfortable and convenient while saving on your energy bills. With this skill you don't need to run the iotGizmo smartphone app to change your heating or cooling, dim lights or control other iotGizmo equipment. You just say "Alexa, set house to 68 degrees" or "Alexa, brighten the light by 10 percent" and voila, it's done.

To get started, enable the skill and link it to your iotGizmo account. When asked, please enter your iotGizmo credentials (the same as you use in the smartphone application).

After that Alexa automatically discovers all your available iotGizmo devices.

You may turn your devices on or off: “Alexa, turn on the light”
Brighten or dim your lights: “Alexa, brighten the light by 10 percent” or “Alexa, dim the light by 10 percent”
Set lights or temperature: “Alexa, set the light to 50 percent” or “Alexa, set the house to 72 degrees”
